channel.title: Www on www
channel.description: Recent content in Www on www

item.title: How It Works
item.description: By typing www will start a web server on port 8000 by default and use as document root the directory where the command was call $ www A different document root may be specified by using the -r option, for example: $ www -r /tmp By default www listen on port 8000, this can be changed by using the -p option: $ www -p 80 may need root privileges
